instructions:
This section is an extended version of previous task, which is clicking on the WORD prompted by the voice.

In cases where you can not hear the word, just give your best guess.
When you are ready, click Continue to hear the first word.

volume.prompt: Let us adjust the volume one more time for louder sounds. Please lower down your volume first.
Now adjust your computer volume up to a comfortable (but not too loud) level.
choices: I have adjusted the volume, let's continue

volume.prompt: Is the right headphone in your right ear, and the left headphone in your left ear? It is very important!
